body_html:
I think the docs is more readable now. But there are still some minor issues:

  • some latex formulas are not rendered because of syntax errors. (there are some KaTeX errors reported in the browser console)
  • inline code was segmented strangely. (ex: torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic = True)
  • It is not intuitive that the text Search Docs in the search docs box won't disappear when users focus on the box. Also, the search docs box doesn't look like an input field at the first glance.
  • The orange dot at the left side of the current section is not align with the text properly.
body_text:
I think the docs is more readable now.  But there are still some minor issues:

some latex formulas are not rendered because of syntax errors. (there are some KaTeX errors reported in the browser console)
inline code was segmented strangely. (ex: torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic = True)

It is not intuitive that the text Search Docs in the search docs box won't disappear when users focus on the box. Also, the search docs box doesn't look like an input field at the first glance.
The orange dot at the left side of the current section is not align with the text properly.
body:
I think the docs is more readable now.  But there are still some minor issues:
- some latex formulas are not rendered because of syntax errors. (there are some KaTeX errors reported in the browser console)
- inline code was segmented strangely. (ex: `torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic = True`)
![screenshot from 2018-10-07 10-52-41](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1811303/46577736-d324c780-ca1f-11e8-921d-0364ce82563f.png)
- It is not intuitive that the text `Search Docs` in the search docs box won't disappear when users focus on the box. Also, the search docs box doesn't look like an input field at the first glance.
- The orange dot at the left side of the current section is not align with the text properly.
![screenshot from 2018-10-07 11-06-08](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1811303/46577785-06b42180-ca21-11e8-9308-92d0d3381b8c.png)
